channel.title: For those who need a good compiler
channel.description:
I take no credit for this compiler, i just came across it, and I'm not stealing the creators idea, im promoting it so more people can have it. Please understand.
If your compiler says: You do not have JDK 5 or JDK 6 go and download from...(blah blah blah). Then this is the compiler for you :
@echo off COLOR 09 title NigahScape Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
just copy paste that into your compiler.bat file and it should say this : note: stream.java uses overrides a deprecated API. note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
If it says that, dont worry, thats a good thing, it means that your server/source has been compiled. Have fun guys.

item.title: For those who need a good compiler
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Use [code ] tags, so people actually know what to use for the compiler…

They should anyways, but just saying…

(Take the space out of the code tag above)

Read full topic

item.title: For those who need a good compiler
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

I take no credit for this compiler, i just came across it, and I’m not stealing the creators idea, im promoting it so more people can have it. Please understand.

If your compiler says: You do not have JDK 5 or JDK 6 go and download from…(blah blah blah). Then this is the compiler for you :

@echo off
COLOR 09
title NigahScape Compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

just copy paste that into your compiler.bat file and it should say this : note: stream.java uses overrides a deprecated API.
note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

If it says that, dont worry, thats a good thing, it means that your server/source has been compiled. Have fun guys.

Read full topic
item.source: For those who need a good compiler
